tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.bad_touch: We're nothing but mammals after all.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.beer: Traditionally-brewed beer has become a luxury, but this one's pretty close to the real deal...
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.bleeding_j: Say the name of this drink three times in front of a mirror and you'll look like a fool.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.blue_fairy: One of these will make all your teeth turn blue. Hope you brushed them well.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.brandtini: 8 out of 10 smug assholes would recommend it but they're too busy being smug assholes.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.cobalt_vel: It's like champagne served on a cup that had a bit of cola left.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.crevice_sp: It will knock the drunkenness out of you or knock you out cold.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.flaming_mo: Secret drink not present in the recipe book.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.fluffy_dre: A couple of these will make your tongue feel velvet-y. More of them and you'll be sleeping soundly.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.fringe_wea: It's like drinking ethylic alcohol with a spoonful of sugar.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.frothy_wat: PG-Rated shows' favorite Beer ersatz since 2040.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.grizzly_te: This one's kinda unbearable. It's mostly for fans of the movie it was used in.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.gut_punch: It's supposed to mean "a punch made of innards", but the name actually describes what you feel while drinking it.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.marsblast: One of these is enough to leave your face red like the actual planet.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.mercurybla: No thermometer was harmed in the creation of this drink.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.moonblast: No relation to the Hadron cannon you can see on the moon for one week every month.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.piano_man: This drink does not represent the opinions of the Bar Pianists Union or its associates.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.piano_woma: It was originally called Pretty Woman, but too many people complained there should be a Piano Woman if there was a Piano Man.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.pile_drive: It doesn't burn as hard on the tongue but you better not have a sore throat when drinking it...
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.sparkle_st: They used to actually sparkle, but too many complaints about skin problem made them redesign the drink without the sparkling.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.sugar_rush: Sweet, light and fruity. As girly as it gets.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.sunshine_c: Tastes like old chocolate milk with its good smell intact. Some say it tastes like caramel too...
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.suplex: A small twist on the Pile Driver, putting more emphasis on the tongue burning and less on the throat burning.
tooltip.va11halla_drinks.info.zen_star: You'd think something so balanced would actually taste nice... you'd be dead wrong.
recipe_info.va11halla_drinks.bad_touch: A Bad Touch is §6§o2 §6§oBronson §6§oExtract§r, §9§o2 §9§oPowdered §9§oDelta§r, §2§o2 §2§oFlanergide§r and §3§o4 §3§oKarmotrine§r. All on the rocks and mixed.
